snippet: The Orquesta Sinfónica de Madrid put on a program of Boulez and Mahler after performing in two operas at Teatro Real this week.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert of symphonic works performed by Orquesta Sinfonica de Madrid ensemble at Auditorio Nacional de Musica in Spain.
lead_paragraph: The Orquesta Sinfónica de Madrid put on a program of Boulez and Mahler after performing in two operas at Teatro Real this week.

headline.seo: Orquesta Sinfónica de Madrid Plays Boulez and Mahler
headline.main: A Break From Opera for Orchestra in Madrid
headline.print_headline: A Break From Opera for Orchestra in Madrid
